snippet.title: Do you think the people in Bulgaria went too far attacking the almost-assassin?
snippet.description: ...39;t seen the video. http://globalgrind.com/news/bulgarian-politician-dodges-assassination-ahmed-dogan-gun-point-gas-footage-video I think he deserved every stomp, kick, and punch...
